page.name: Mummy's Curse
page.description: This item requires a Dragon Amulet. The head of this magic staff is a cursed mummy's hand. It shows all your enemies that you hold power over life and death. It also makes an awesome back scratcher.

properties.name: Mummy's Curse
properties.description: This item requires a Dragon Amulet. The head of this magic staff is a cursed mummy's hand. It shows all your enemies that you hold power over life and death. It also makes an awesome back scratcher.

page.name: The Hard Way
page.description: Kasuf is hiding in these ruins somewhere. You HAVE to make contact with him without letting Zhoom catch you or you might never get to the Orb of Light before Sepulchure. This may be your only chance!

properties.name: The Hard Way
properties.description: Kasuf is hiding in these ruins somewhere. You HAVE to make contact with him without letting Zhoom catch you or you might never get to the Orb of Light before Sepulchure. This may be your only chance!
properties.complete: Well done hero, you have slipped Kasuf out of the ruins right under Zhoom's nose, saved him from Sek-Duat's wrath at least for a while and re-established contact with the resistance!
